value.message: Catch block does not log the root cause of the error with sufficient context information.
value.suggestion: Include more context in the log, such as the email being checked and use error.stack if available.

value.message: Catch block does not log the root cause of the error with sufficient context information.
value.suggestion: Include more context in the log, such as the email being checked and use error.stack if available.

value.message: Access control error (email uniqueness check) falls back to allowing registration if checkEmailExists throws an error.
value.suggestion: On error in email uniqueness check, deny registration by setting errors.email to a generic error message instead of allowing registration.

value.message: Access control error (email existence check) falls back to allowing password reset if checkEmailExists throws an error.
value.suggestion: On error in email existence check, deny password reset by setting errors.email to a generic error message instead of allowing reset.
